description: Became the youngest person ever to attain the Cisco Certified Networking Associate (CCNA).
Got paid to make training courses for security analysts.
Started a cyber security club at my school. Became National Champion at the CyberTaipan cyber defence competition.
Reached Pro Hacker level on HackTheBox. Top 1% on TryHackMe.
Won Gold Medal at the International Genetically Engineered Machine (iGEM) competition for research into synthetic biology. Led the first Australasian high school team to achieve this.
Graduated high school as Dux of School, with a university entrance rank of 99.95 (= top 0.05% in Australia).
Became National Champion of the CyberTaipan cyber defence competition for 4 consecutive years.
Became a software engineering intern at SafetyCulture, as part of the Business Systems Architecture team.
Started my degree in Computer Science at UNSW. Received a Co-op Scholarship (4 spots, $21600 p.a.) and Scientia Scholarship ($5000).
Finished my internship at SafetyCulture. Decided to delve into the world of startups.
In a span of 2 weeks, won prizes in 3 hackathons and came 3rd in a startup pitch competition (prize sum: $2200).
Joined Nullify, a startup building the world's first AI security engineer. I've built agents to auto-fix vulnerabilities, reverse schemas from code, and hack systems.
Winning some more hackathons. Exploring some ideas. Exchange at Harvard.
